Subject: Server Web Certificate Update
Description: We are attempting to update the web certificate again as it has expired and the normal fields are not accepting the certs we generated. Please advise on what is required to generate the certs or have the server accept the certs. A full procedure for this normal operation would be great to have for this issue. cc michael.almaguer@bluehalo.com
What_We_Know__c:
30.04
Sent the instructions for Server Certificate set up/update

The customer is still getting the error when uploading the server certificate. We asked for a remote session.

01.05
Customer confirmed they managed to upload the certificate (they had to decrypt the files first)
Next_Steps__c:
30.04
Wait for the customer to confirm if it worked, otherwise, we'll schedule a remote session.
Solution_Comment__c: The customer resolved the issue independently after identifying the need to decrypt the certificate files.
